imdb.plot outline: So. What's the Fu, you ask? Simple: it's a pinch of Mystery Science Theater, a dash of Wayne's World, a cup of You Can't Do That On Television, and a giant slab of Cincinnati chili, but really, there's nothing on television like it. Cap'n Dave and his Fu Crew team up each week to host the weirdest and wildest Z-grade action movies we could afford. Scattered throughout the movie are comedy skits, performances from local rock bands, and plenty of shout-outs to our dwindling number of fans watching at home - all beamed out live, so there's no fixing any of our many, many on-air mistakes, and archived here, so there's no escaping our failures. Oh, and there are puppets, because, really, what's a TV show without 'em?
imdb.title: Friday Night Fu
